instructions.ar: انعطف يساراً حاداً لتبقى على Shibuya Crossing
instructions.da: Drej skarpt til venstre videre ved Shibuya Crossing
instructions.de: Scharf links weiterfahren an Shibuya Crossing
instructions.en: Make a sharp left at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ege maldekstren ĉe Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es: Gira a la izquierda en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es-ES: Gire a la izquierda en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fi: Jatka jyrkästi vasempaan tielle Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fr: Tourner franchement à gauche en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.he: פנה בחדות שמאלה כדי להישאר על Shibuya Crossing
instructions.hu: Forduljon élesen balra az Shibuya Crossing
instructions.id: Make a sharp left at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.it: Fai una curva stretta a sinistra al Shibuya Crossing
instructions.my: Shibuya Crossingပေါ်တွင်နေရန် ဘယ်ဘက်ထောင့်ချိုးကွေ့ပါ
instructions.no: Sving skarpt til venstre i Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pl: Skręć ostro w lewo na Shibuya Crossing

instructions.pt-PT: Vire acentuadamente à esquerda em Shibuya Crossing

instructions.ru: Резко поверните налево на Shibuya Crossing

instructions.tr: Shibuya Crossing konumunda sola keskin dönüş yap
